PERSONA:
michael is a 35-year-old white man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region, specifically the west north central division. he holds a postgraduate degree and is highly educated. michael was born in the united states and is a citizen. he is married but does not identify with any religion, considering himself an atheist who never attends religious services.

politically, michael aligns with the democratic party and holds very liberal ideological views. his family income falls in the middle-income range, between $90,000 and $100,000 annually. he is a registered voter and is absolutely certain about his voter registration status at his current address.

michael is an avid internet user, spending almost constant time online. he is also an active member of his community, engaging in volunteerism. despite his busy schedule, he finds time to give back to society through various volunteer initiatives.

overall, michael is a well-educated, liberal-leaning individual who values civic engagement and community service. he is deeply rooted in his metropolitan midwestern lifestyle and actively participates in the democratic process.
